subtitleNullable: Collection of news, reports and books in text format
descriptionNullable:
I used this corpus to train a word2vec model for my master thesis - feel free to use it too!

Corpus contains about 14 million words. It is a collection of public available news, reports and book (including the brown corpus).
title: 14 million word corpus (.txt)
subtitle: Collection of news, reports and books in text format
description:
I used this corpus to train a word2vec model for my master thesis - feel free to use it too!

Corpus contains about 14 million words. It is a collection of public available news, reports and book (including the brown corpus).
